Clean the variable Gender

Source: R/clean_gender.R
clean_gender.Rd

This function attempts to add the label "chromosomal sex", but lots of functions remove attributes, such as droplevels()

Usage

clean_gender(data)

Arguments

data

a data.frame

Value

a modified version of data

Examples

test_data |> clean_gender()
#> # A tibble: 686 × 469
#>    Study `FXS ID` `Event Name` `Visit Date` `Visit Number` `Age at visit` Gender
